I question the amount of weight rawr is placing on spirt.  I only use set bonuses as a referance. 

I was looking at Pennant Cloak and it's set bonus.  In the model for my toon it lists higher dps for perified twilight opal over runed scarlet ruby.  I done the math myself and even with the spirt buff for mages.  Runed scarlet ruby should still come out ahead of the opal.  The dps differance after the spirt buff was much closer but still should still behind. 

I question that the weighting system is 100%????

There is no weighting system. Read the readme, there are no stat weights at all. Whatever provides the most DPS is rated highest. If you have any actual math to back up your claim, we'd love to hear it.
